original_text: And in every province, whithersoever the king's commandment and his decree came, there was great mourning among the Jews, and fasting, and weeping, and wailing; and many lay in sackcloth and ashes.
korean_text: 왕의 명령과 조서가 각 지방에 이르매 유다인이 크게 애통하여 금식하며 울며 부르짖고 굵은 베 옷을 입고 재에 누운 자가 무수하더라

sentences.original_text: whithersoever the king's commandment and his decree came
there was great mourning among the Jews
and many lay in sackcloth and ashes
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 많은 사람들이 굵은 베옷과 재 속에 누워 있었다
